resources.string: Thank you for upgrading to premium!

I Love is an awesome application natively coded in Kotlin. At the beginning, the goal was to draw a beautiful heart.\nThen, the idea to create a simple game with little hearts came.\nFind the easter eggs by touching everywhere ;)
Feedback on the I Love app.
Be part of the adventure with I Love app in Beta: https://www.chillcoding.com/app/ilove/
I win an award with I Love!
The Application need permissions to remember you on other devices.
Cannot update top scores because of internet connection.
Cannot have latest top scores, try later :)

string-array.name: text_love
string-array.item:
THE ONLY WAY
TO DO
GREAT WORK
IS TO
LOVE
WHAT YOU DO.
-> Steve Jobs

WE FALL IN
LOVE
BY CHANCE
WE STAY IN
LOVE
BY CHOICE.

YOU KNOW
YOU ARE IN
LOVE
WHEN YOU CAN'T
FALL ASLEEP
BECAUSE REALITY
IS FINALLY
BETTER THAN YOUR
DREAMS.

ALONE
WE GO FASTER
TOGETHER
WE GO FURTHER.
-> African proverb

TO IMPROVE
IS TO CHANGE
TO BE PERFECT
IS TO CHANGE OFTEN.
-> Winston Churchill

EVERYTHING
WILL BE
OK IN
THE END.
IF IT‚ÄôS NOT OK
IT‚ÄôS NOT
THE END.

THIS IS A TEST
IF YOU CAN
READ THIS
ALL THE WAY
DOWN TO HERE
PLEASE
GET OFF MY COMPUTER.

TO BE A
CHAMP
YOU HAVE TO
BELIEVE
IN YOURSELF
WHEN NOBODY
ELSE WILL.
-> Sugar Ray Robinson

THINK Positively
EXERCISE Daily
EAT Healthy
WORK Hard
 STAY Strong
WORRY Less
DANCE More
LOVE Often
BE Happy.

string-array.name: text_award
string-array.item:
"Congratulations!
You won the 'I ‚ô°' award, it's the first of a long set.
" "Note: The following awards are only available with the premium purchase.
" "
I Love App
The 'I Love' app starts with an exceptional heart, as you have certainly noticed only its size, its color and its speed change. The shape is always the same, in this way it is unique.
" "
I ‚ô°
'I ‚ô°'Ô∏è is the global symbol for souvenirs of every places:
I ‚ô° SF
I ‚ô°Ô∏è LA
I ‚ô°Ô∏è BCN
" "
I ‚ô° Cannes
By the way, the story starts in Cannes, in french riviera.
6:08 AM darkness had not long surrendered to the light. While the sun rises, the thin clouds are cast over the sky, taking sequentially the most beautiful colors of a rainbow, from purple to yellow. The sea is tainted; no longer an abyss of black. Instead, it looked a metallic blue. There is no denying that any words can describe a sunrise. Nevertheless everyone can see it. Last but not least, under the sun we are all the same."
